subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Carey Price made 26 saves for the shutout, and the Montreal Canadiens beat the Boston Bruins, 4-0, on Monday night to force Game 7 in their Eastern Conference semifinal series.
snippet: Carey Price made 26 saves for the shutout, and the Montreal Canadiens beat the Boston Bruins, 4-0, on Monday night to force Game 7 in their Eastern Conference semifinal series.
